name: brackets-utf8-converter
title: Brackets Extension - UTF8 converter
description: This project is an extension of Az-Encode <https://github.com/Azakur4/Az-Encode>, written by Jimmy Brian Anamaria Torres <captasfire@hotmail.com>. It provides a way to convert single files or whole directories (and subdirectories) to UTF-8.
author: Gabriel GASNOT <gabriel.gasnot@gmail.com>
